posts.post_content:
Looking for a beat up Mecca Leach/Gibson.
Want to spend 20, 30 bucks.

Let me know.

-Marty

Hey Marty!

I have a respectable factory 30 back - just came back from SGC graded Fair 20.  does have a pin hole on the lower half.  I would sell it for $30 plus whatever it would take to ship it to you.

let me know...

sorry for the fuzzy pics.  let me know if u want better photos.

thanks!

Cliff
